module.name: Custom Applications
module.description: Registry to add custom extensions and destinations that may be created and used so that the Extensions and Destinations Registry can include these.
module.changelog: *2.8.0.1* #4618 XSS patch *2.8.0.0* published 2.8 version *2.7.0.0* localizations *2.6.0.2* localizations *2.6.0.1* localizations, misc *2.6.0.0* stoped harmless php warning msg *2.5.0.4* #3263, localization fixes *2.5.0.3* localizations fixes *2.5.0.2* localization, Swedish *2.5.0.1* #3003 spelling *2.5.0* #2845 tabindex *2.4.0.5* #2843 Russian Translation *2.4.0.4* #2700 block editing of destination field when once other modules are using it *2.4.0.3* added depends on 2.4.0 *2.4.0.2* #2558 can't edit/del custom extension *2.4.0.1* Fix typo in install script, non-existent primary key *2.4.0* First release of module
